name: Still River Funds
overview:
Still River is a classic venture capital organization investing in dynamic growing companies who have created cutting edge products or services that have the potential to play a dominant role in the industry they serve. Most investments that the fund makes will be in private companies located in the northeast United States and doing business in the information technology, communications and life sciences industries.

Raising capital from outside investors is an important step for any growing company. The Still River team evaluates the business model, business concept, industry, potential return and track record, experience and background of each company. When contemplating making an investment in a company, Still River looks closely at whether a strong relationship with management can be created.
